mapper.select: select count(*) from news_t where status = 0
mapper.insert: insert into news_t(n_idx, subject, writer, content, file_name, ori_name, pwd, write_date, ip, hit, status) values(news_t_seq.nextval, #{subject}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{file_name}, #{ori_name}, #{pwd}, sysdate, #{ip}, #{hit}, #{status})
insert into ncomment_t(c_idx, writer, content, pwd, write_date, ip, n_idx) values(ncomment_t_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{content}, #{pwd}, sysdate, #{ip}, #{n_idx})
mapper.update: update news_t set status = 1 where n_idx = #{n_idx} and pwd =#{pwd}
